actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Specialty Crops and Natural Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Specialty Crops and Natural Resources

official_title: To amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to revise the reserve stock level for burley tobacco, to increase the amount of scrap tobacco permitted to be marketed, and to authorize the lease and transfer of burley tobacco quotas between farms in adjacent counties in the State of Virginia under certain circumstances.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to: (1) revise burley tobacco reserve stock levels; (2) increase the amount of marketable scrap tobacco; and (3) permit burley tobacco quota lease and transfers between farms in adjacent Virginia counties if approved by a State-wide, producer referendum.

titles.title: To amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to revise the reserve stock level for burley tobacco, to increase the amount of scrap tobacco permitted to be marketed, and to authorize the lease and transfer of burley tobacco quotas between farms in adjacent counties in the State of Virginia under certain circumstances.
